text: Welcome to DU! The truly grassroots left-of-center political community where regular people, not algorithms, drive the discussions and set the standards. (Original Post) spanone 17 min ago OP [Realistically, even if a reporter did ask a follow-up question,](#post1)Ocelot II 15 min ago #1 [True, but this shit is just shameful.](#post2)spanone 15 min ago #2 [Access journalism. If they aren't "nice", they lose access](#post3)Maeve 12 min ago #3 [At least Scripps News has been pausing this mega-rant](#post4)Jrose 11 min ago #4 (118,437 posts) [Ocelot II](/?com=profile&uid=133466) 1. Realistically, even if a reporter did ask a follow-up question, Thu Aug 15, 2024, 05:52 PM 15 min ago the only response would be just another helping of word salad. They shouldn't be covering these events at all. (136,962 posts) [spanone](/?com=profile&uid=118248) 2. True, but this shit is just shameful. Reply to [Ocelot II (Reply #1)](#post1) Thu Aug 15, 2024, 05:52 PM 15 min ago (42,657 posts) [Maeve](/?com=profile&uid=106309) 3. Access journalism. If they aren't "nice", they lose access Thu Aug 15, 2024, 05:55 PM 12 min ago It was a mistake to start it and worse to continue, but there will always be those willing to give their souls for soundbites. (1,117 posts) [Jrose](/?com=profile&uid=368139) 4. At least Scripps News has been pausing this mega-rant Thu Aug 15, 2024, 05:56 PM 11 min ago about every 10 minutes to fact check. When Djt bragged about imaginary great polls, the channel popped up a graphic showing Harris's lead. Wondering when Djt's speed pills will wear off...
